FuncDef: This command specifies a list of servers where DHCP6 requests will be forwarded. The list of servers can entered as either IP addresses or fully qualified domain names. There must be at least one server specified for DHCP6 relay to work. If there are multiple servers then the request is forwarded to all of the servers in the list.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies up to eight non-global IPv4 addresses including a zone index as defined by the InetAddressIPv4z textual convention.
